name: KINDRED  SPIRITS  ANIMAL KINDNESS  ECO-CHARITY  BRACELETS
description:
100% proceeds donated to charity.  50% of proceeds donated to your favorite charitable organization or cause *.  Made of recycled sterling silver, recycled color fused glass beads, and cording from repurposed soda pop bottles.  Size is adjustable.  Free Shipping.  Please select the bracelet you would like from the drop down bracelet selection bar.

* Your purchase is tax deductible (your purchase is actually a donation, and bracelet is our gift of gratitude for making your donation).  Please include the name and contact information of your favorite charitable organization.

All jewelry designs are handcrafted by Kindred Spirits Artisans, and are copyrighted and trademarked in accordance with the law. No jewelry designs can be copied, duplicated or reproduced, or sold for resale.

name: KINDRED SPIRITS  WORLD PEACE  GEMSTONE  ECO-CHARITY  NECKLACE
description:
♥ 100% of proceeds donated to charity.  50% donated to your favorite charity of choice. Please leave us a message in the PayPal message box of the name and contact information your favorite charity when making your payment.

♥ Our Kindred Spirits Signature World Peace Gemstone necklace is ECO-FRIENDLY, made from recycled sterling silver and repurpose soda pop bottles for the cording.  Gemstone peace sign pendant is 1 3/8" in diameter.  Our signature world peace unity bead has the words world peace carved around the top diameter, and people holding hands around the bottom diameter.  Length can be adjusted to approximately 35" long.  FREE SHIPPING.

name: KINDRED SPIRITS TURQUOISE GEMSTONE ECO-CHARITY HORSE PENDANT NECKLACES
KINDRED SPIRITS SHARE KINDNESS ECO-CHARITY DOLPHIN BRACELET
KINDRED SPIRITS TURQUOISE GEMSTONE ECO-CHARITY PENDANT NECKLACES
description: Support Animals and the Environment by wearing these beautifully handcrafted Kindred Spirits Turquoise Pendant necklaces.  Features eco-friendly turquoise gemstones, recycled sterling silver charms and beads.  Adjustable size necklace is black corded from repurposed soda pop bottles. Free Shipping.  50% proceeds donated to buyer's named charity or cause.  Remaining 50% proceeds donated to animal and environmental charities and causes.
